Package Controllers

Class TheatreManager

java.lang.Object
Controllers.TheatreManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Manager
public class TheatreManager extends Object implements Manager
Theatre Manager allows console user to create, read, update, and delete theatres

    • findTheatre

      public static Theatre findTheatre(String cineplexCode, int theatreId)
      Read method. Find show by Cineplex Code and TheatreId
      Parameters:
      cineplexCode - Cineplex code that theatre belongs to
      theatreId - Theatre ID of theatre
      Returns:
      Object of type Theatre

    • setBusy

      public static void setBusy(String cineplexCode, int theatreId)
      Set theatre busy by finding a match to cineplexCode and theatreID. Sets that theatre to busy.
      Parameters:
      cineplexCode - Cineplex code that theatre belongs to
      theatreId - Theatre ID of theatre

    • setFree

      public static void setFree(String cineplexCode, int theatreId)
      Set theatre free by finding a match to cineplexCode and theatreID. Sets that theatre to free.
      Parameters:
      cineplexCode - Cineplex code that theatre belongs to
      theatreId - Theatre ID of theatre

    • printTheatreList

      public static void printTheatreList(int cineplexSelector)
      Read method to display and print everything on the txt file database.
      Parameters:
      cineplexSelector - integer for selecting cineplex
